thread.title: mophie Expands Universal Battery Line With Colorful, Compact Collection Of Fast-Charging External Power Devices
thread.title_full: mophie Expands Universal Battery Line With Colorful, Compact Collection Of Fast-Charging External Power Devices

author: admin
title: mophie Expands Universal Battery Line With Colorful, Compact Collection Of Fast-Charging External Power Devices
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 7:00 AM   mophie 
ORANGE COUNTY, Calif., Sept. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- mophie--the #1 selling mobile battery case in North America(1), and innovator of intelligent solutions for mobile devices--announced today the power reserve(TM) collection of premium, universal batteries for smartphones and smaller USB devices. Compact and reliable, the power reserve line is available in two easy-to-carry sizes, various colors and with LED battery level indicators for a combination of style and functionality. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150916/267067 
"Since the start, we've obsessed over creating the finest performing, most visually appealing products on the mobile charging market," said Daniel Huang, mophie CEO and Co-Founder. "This proven approach continues with the new power reserve collection, which also features a fresh design intended to be accessible to an even wider range of users." 
The power reserve(TM) 1X ($34.95) --available in black, white, blue, purple and pink--is equipped with a 1.8A output for an 80% faster charging rate, and a powerful 2,600mAh rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery for a full charge to your smartphone. Users can enjoy up to 14 additional hours of talk time, 10 additional hours of web browsing, 11 additional hours of video playback, and 50 additional hours of music playback. 
The power reserve(TM) 2X ($49.95) --available in black--is equipped with a 2.1A output and a powerful 6,000mAh rechargeable lithium-ion polymer battery for a full charge to your smartphone. Users can enjoy up to 28 additional hours of talk time, 20 additional hours of web browsing, 22 additional hours of video playback, and 100 additional hours of music playback. 
The mophie power reserve(TM) is currently available for pre-order at mophie.com. 
For the latest details and updates about all mophie products, follow mophie on Facebook , Twitter , and Instagram , and register at mophie.com/innovation . 
mophie, the #1 selling battery case manufacturer in North America, is a California-based, award-winning designer and manufacturer that empowers the mobile world to do more. Widely acclaimed for innovative mobile solutions, mophie is the proud developer of the original juice pack(Â®). mophie products are recognized for style and engineered for performance, providing a seamless integration of hardware, software and design. mophie has operations in California, Michigan, Netherlands, Hong Kong, and China. mophie products are available in more than 130 countries, and can be found at Best Buy, Verizon, and T-Mobile stores, as well as Sprint and other leading retailers. Visit mophie.com and follow us on Facebook , Twitter , and Instagram (@mophie). 
1. "US Tech Geo Level Monthly Retail - US Retail Monthly Store Level", July 2015, available from The NPD Group, Inc. 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/mophie-expands-universal-battery-line-with-colorful-compact-collection-of-fast-charging-external-power-devices-300143954.html 
SOURCE mophie
